trends: There have been no other sightings in LaGrange
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Detailsit was about 8:30 on september 21 2009 and i was at my friends party. we were about to pick teams for manhunt when out of the corner of my eye i saw a bright light. i asked everybody else around and they all saw it too. i watched for about 15-20 mins with my friends until the cone of light dissappeared gradually until a few remnants of light was still in the sky. it sat in one spot the whole time as if hovering.as soon as i saw it i knew it was a ufo because nothing can make that type of light unless it is a ufo. afterwards us who saw it talked about it and then played manhunt. i didnt realize they enormity of the sightings until the following wednsday i heard others saw it on the radio. i was excited to have actually seen a ufo cause ive dreampt of it and i am now a firm believer but i believed before. none of my friends believe me besides the ones who saw it.
Summary: triangular cone of light seen by many people
